title: Pizza Margherita
description: Pizza Margherita is a classic Italian pizza known for its simplicity and delicious flavors. It features a thin crust topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil, creating a harmonious blend of savory and herbal tastes that delight the palate.
